name: Rosemary Garlic Chicken Bow Ties
description: Epicure's flavourful Seasoning can be used in many ways. Here, it adds punchy rosemary and garlic flavour to easy summer pasta.

ingredients.name: bow tie pasta or gluten-free pasta

preparation: In Multipurpose Pot, cook pasta according to package directions until al dente.
Meanwhile, in a large bowl, combine tomatoes, chicken, oil, and Rosemary Garlic Seasoning.
Drain pasta, add to bowl, and toss with Parmesan. Season with Salt and Pepper.
